generated_body: In the article titled "17 restaurants that will be open on Thanksgiving," the user is likely expecting a comprehensive list of dining options available on the holiday. The content may detail a variety of restaurant types, ranging from fast-food chains to sit-down establishments, providing information on their specific hours of operation. Additionally, the article could include insights into any special Thanksgiving menus or promotions that these restaurants may offer. Overall, the piece is anticipated to serve as a practical guide for those looking to dine out on Thanksgiving, helping readers make informed choices about where to celebrate the day.
